programme.title: Jesse Jackson in Cuba
programme.short_synopsis: Jesse Jackson meets Fidel Castro in Cuba and negotiates the release of 22 US prisoners.
programme.medium_synopsis: The Reverend Jesse Jackson meets Fidel Castro in Cuba and negotiates the release of 22 US prisoners from Cuban jails, much to the embarrassment of the Reagan administration.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
